def process_list_block(docstring, starting_point, section_end, leading_spaces, marker): import re ending_point = docstring.find('\n\n', starting_point) block = docstring[starting_point:ending_point] # Place marker for later reinjection. docstring_slice = docstring[starting_point:section_end].replace(block, marker) docstring = docstring[:starting_point] + docstring_slice + docstring[section_end:] lines = block.split('\n') lines = ['
  • ' + re.sub(r'^\s*-\s*__(.*__):(.*)', r'\1:\2
    • ', line) for line in lines] block = '
      \n' + '\n'.join(lines) + '\n
    ' return docstring, block
